channel.title: Need port help
channel.description: Hello i made a server. and when i fucking do the fucking instructions where it says default 43594. i used this fucking guide btw http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html#post_source ok im in port foward part i click internet conections click properties on my connections. then i go in the firewall thing make new thing new server name. i enter my ip i made which was chriscape.no-ip.info and i enter 43594. and i think finally im done and i go on server status and those fucking words always come up.. your server is offline please register it when its online. i turned on no-ip duc watever. am i supposed to enter my no-ip address or my ip on my computer which is 24.17.233.96.... if you help me figure what the hell is going on. i will give you 3m and add mithsword on runescape if you help. plz i need help so bad[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 02:16:06 PM[/size][hr]Fuck... no one knows

item.title: Need port help
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

go to start>run>type cmd in the box>type ipconfig>and you will see your computer ip and default ip. type your default ip in the address bar. if it asks for a user and pass just put admin as the pass and leave the username blank. Go to applications and games or a tab that says portforwarding and type in your sources port can be 43594 or 5555. now type in your computers ip. again go to start>run>type cmd in the box>type ipconfig>and you will see your computer ip. put the TCP or UDP thing to TCP then enable it and save it. then your done! pm me if you need any other help…

Read full topic

item.title: Need port help
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Go to the no-ip site. You have to download DUC. It’s like a program that turns on your no-ip. Hard to explain. Download it and log in to it using your no-ip login details.

item.title: Need port help
item.dc:creator: @coolguy44 coolguy44
item.description:
@coolguy44 wrote:

Ok… Ok i pressed the little icon on the side of the computer (open network connections) and i right click my wireless internet connections and click on properties. then i click on advanced tab. then go to settings. and i go to the exceptions tab. then i see add port and click on it. then i enter my server ip (chriscape.no-ip.info) and it says enter 43594 as port. then i press ok. then its on a check and i press ok. then i want to add it to server status page. and it says your server is offline. and i told my friend try getting on. but he couldnt. so im stuck. do you know the problem? 3m if you know it all and you get to be admin on server if you want[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 02:27:25 PM[/size][hr]by settings i mean firewall settings[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 02:28:50 PM[/size][hr]can you help??

Read full topic
